title: A Huge Victory for the Trump Team (Ep 1065)
description:
In this episode, I address the resounding legal victory yesterday for the Trump administration. I also address the stunning court filing in the Mike Flynn case that should answer this big question. I discuss a new low for CNN and a troubling proposal to attack the Second Amendment by Beto O’Rourke. News Picks:The latest liberal lunacy. Proper grammar is “racist” now.

 

Are black Americans moving towards the political center, and away from the Left?

 

This liberal judge gets smacked down by the Supreme Court.

 

This article debunks the latest anti-Trump nonsense in the media. 

 

Democrats actually voted against legislation requiring medical care for infants born after failed abortions. 

 

Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
